Ghost - Class in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
The Ghost is a specialized BoardObject that has the ability to look at its surroundings, communicate with other ghosts, and move around the board.
Ghost(Board) - Constructor for class edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.Ghost
Constructs a new Ghost with a new random number generator
Ghost(Board, Random) - Constructor for class edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.Ghost
Constructs a new Ghost with the given random number generator and initializes the exploredPositions array By default, a Ghost uses the LINEAR GhostMovementAlgorithmType
GhostMovementAlgorithm - Interface in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
A GhostMovementAlgorithm uses a Ghost's explored positions and other information a Ghost has to determine the next position on the map the Ghost should move towards.
GhostMovementAlgorithmType - Enum in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
The GhostMovementAlgorithmType is an enumeration factory for creating appropriate instances of the GhostMovementAlgorithm interface.
GhostObserver - Interface in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
 
GhostVisionBoardRenderer - Class in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
Renders the Board in "Ghost Vision" - which masks any spaces not explored by the ghosts in the game with a hash mark, except for the Target and the Ghosts themselves
GhostVisionBoardRenderer() - Constructor for class edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.GhostVisionBoardRenderer
